description: This source file implements the core functions of the CCSP CWMP Session Object, including creation, removal, enrollment of subordinate objects, and initialization. It defines the object lifecycle and setup routines pertinent to managing a CWMP session within the broader CCSP framework.

classes.name: CCSP_CWMP_SESSION_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the core session object in the CWMP protocol, managing session state, timers, connection objects, and method pointers for handling CWMP operations.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CcspCwmpsoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new CCSP CWMP Session Object with provided context handles.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified CWMP session object and cleans up associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required subordinate objects such as timers and connection interfaces into the session object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs detailed initialization of the session object, setting default values, function pointers, and establishing internal state.
